ai-tha-ap308:1.3_0: he has achieved fallen under the sway of wealth,
ai-tha-ap308:1.4_0: I have gone for refuge to you.’
ai-tha-ap308:3.3_0: filling the mind with confidence in the Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap308:4.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap308:4.4_0: I’m not stuck in the air.
ai-tha-ap308:5.1_0: for a long time I’ve reached the goal
ai-tha-ap308:6.1_0: Then I was the field in the field,
ai-tha-ap308:6.3_0: filling the mind with confidence in the Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap308:6.4_0: I’ll rejoice in heaven for an eon.’
ai-tha-ap308:7.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap308:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap308:7.4_0: This is the fruit of confidence.
ai-tha-ap308:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saviṭṭha.
ai-tha-ap308:10.1_0: for the sixth Elder nuns inspiring confidence;
